description: Describes the specified Amazon Web Services Verified Access trust providers.

parameters.name: VerifiedAccessTrustProviderIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the Verified Access trust providers. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. Filter names and values are case-sensitive. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessTrustProviders
nested_items.description: Details about the Verified Access trust providers.

nested_items.name: VerifiedAccessTrustProviderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Verified Access trust provider.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description for the Amazon Web Services Verified Access trust provider.

nested_items.name: TrustProviderType
nested_items.description: The type of Verified Access trust provider.

nested_items.name: UserTrustProviderType
nested_items.description: The type of user-based trust provider.

nested_items.name: DeviceTrustProviderType
nested_items.description: The type of device-based trust provider.

nested_items.name: OidcOptions
nested_items.description: The options for an OpenID Connect-compatible user-identity trust provider.

nested_items.name: Issuer
nested_items.description: The OIDC issuer.

nested_items.name: AuthorizationEndpoint
nested_items.description: The OIDC authorization endpoint.

nested_items.name: TokenEndpoint
nested_items.description: The OIDC token endpoint.

nested_items.name: UserInfoEndpoint
nested_items.description: The OIDC user info endpoint.

nested_items.name: ClientId
nested_items.description: The client identifier.

nested_items.name: ClientSecret
nested_items.description: The client secret.

nested_items.name: Scope
nested_items.description: The OpenID Connect (OIDC) scope specified.

nested_items.name: DeviceOptions
nested_items.description: The options for device-identity trust provider.

nested_items.name: TenantId
nested_items.description: The ID of the tenant application with the device-identity provider.

nested_items.name: PublicSigningKeyUrl
nested_items.description: The URL Amazon Web Services Verified Access will use to verify the authenticity of the device tokens.

nested_items.name: PolicyReferenceName
nested_items.description: The identifier to be used when working with policy rules.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last updated time.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: SseSpecification
nested_items.description: The options in use for server side encryption.

nested_items.name: CustomerManagedKeyEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether customer managed KMS keys are in use for server side encryption.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the KMS key.

nested_items.name: NativeApplicationOidcOptions
nested_items.description: The OpenID Connect (OIDC) options.

nested_items.name: PublicSigningKeyEndpoint
nested_items.description: The public signing key endpoint.

nested_items.name: Issuer
nested_items.description: The OIDC issuer identifier of the IdP.

nested_items.name: AuthorizationEndpoint
nested_items.description: The authorization endpoint of the IdP.

nested_items.name: TokenEndpoint
nested_items.description: The token endpoint of the IdP.

nested_items.name: UserInfoEndpoint
nested_items.description: The user info endpoint of the IdP.

nested_items.name: ClientId
nested_items.description: The OAuth 2.0 client identifier.

nested_items.name: Scope
nested_items.description: The set of user claims to be requested from the IdP.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
